DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate Chinese post-menopausal woman combination drospirenone 2 mg estradiol 1 mg treatment climacteric symptom , hot flush ( vasomotor symptom ) uro-genital complaint .
DOC.brief_title: Safety/Efficacy Study Drospirenone/Estradiol Treat Postmenopausal Chinese Women With Vasomotor Symptoms .
DOC.detailed_description: The study previously post Schering AG , Germany . Schering AG , Germany rename Bayer HealthCare AG , Germany . Bayer HealthCare AG , Germany sponsor trial .
DOC.criteria: Chinese postmenopausal woman moderate severe vasomotor symptom History steroid hormone dependent malignant disease Known suspect malignant premalignant disease Current history severe heart , liver , renal , psychiatric disease Hyperlipemia
